inputs.prompt:
Shot 1: Extreme close-up of Character 1’s determined face, hands tightly gripping a spear, rain cascading down polished armor. Character 1 speaks in fluent English with a gravelly voice: "I will not yield!" Heavy, labored breathing; raindrops striking metal with sharp, clinking sounds. Hyper-detailed, gritty texture.

Shot 2: Close-up of Character 2’s piercing, intense gaze, streaks of blood smudged across the face, weapon held in a battle-ready stance. Character 2 responds in clear English with a cold tone: "Then this ends now." Thunder rumbles in the background, raindrops splashing violently against the ground. High contrast, dramatic lighting.

Shot 3: Epic wide shot: Two characters stand 20 meters apart, weapons raised, thick smoke swirling between them under roiling storm clouds. Eyes locked in a death stare, tension palpable. Wind howls fiercely, distant battle cries echo. All environmental sounds and dialogue must be in English. Cinematic, epic confrontation scene, film-grade composition.
